claimFunds().details: Claim raise tokens back if the fundraising is set as failed

claimTokens().details: Claim the tokens after the fundraising is finalized

constructor.details: Constructor to initialize the fundraiser contract

params.amount: The amount of raise tokens to contribute

finalize().details: Finalize the fundraising campaign when the goal is reached

getRequiredAmountsForLiquidity(uint256).details: View function to compute the required amounts of both tokens to create the pair

params.raiseTokenAmount: The amount of raise tokens to be used for liquidity

returns._1: raiseTokenAmount The amount of raise tokens to be used
returns.requiredSaleTokens: The amount of sale tokens required

initSwapPair(uint24,int24,int24).details: Initialize the swap pair after the fundraising is finalized

params.poolFee: The fee to be charged by the pool
params.tickLower: The lower tick of the pool
params.tickUpper: The upper tick of the pool

initialize(address,address,string,string.details: Initializes the fundraiser contract Typically called by the factory contract

params._campaign: The campaign contract to be used
params._positionManager: The Uniswap V3 position manager contract
params._vesting: The vesting contract that is created only if vesting is enabled
params._vestingDuration: The duration of the vesting in seconds
params._vestingStartDelta: The start of the vesting in seconds after the end of the fundraising
params._websiteLink: The website link of the project

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setFailed().details: Set the fundraising as failed if the campaign type allows so

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
